resources.string: Beyonce And Ed Sheeran Finally Sang ‘Drunk In Love’ Together And It Was Glorious
Ariana Grande Surprises Coldplay Fans Onstage: Watch

After covering the sultry Beyonce track for Ryan Seacrest and Elvis Duran during radio interviews, the British singer got the real deal to join him on Saturday night (Sept. 26) at Global Citizen Festival in New York’s Central Park.

When Chris Martin asked his kids, Apple and Moses, who they wanted to come onstage during Coldplay’s set at Saturday’s (Sept. 26) Global Citizen Festival, he said there were a few weeks of deliberation. But when Ariana Grande came onstage, you know they made the right choice
